title: Resolution Help
body:
I accidentally changed my resolution in game. I couldn't change it back and now I exited the game. It wont even let me connect or start a new game, I always get bug splatted. How can I change the resolution back to 1920x1080 without being able to be in a game? 

Thank you so much in advance.

replies.body:
Oh no!  No worries, you can reset your resolution by resetting you config.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

While it's possible this caused the bug splat, there could be other issues to.  I suggest double checking in a custom game so you don't run into any penalties.  Let me know if that fixes the issue.
